content:
User: Finding info on Google Drive file links now, like https://drive.google.com/file/d/1WKOUjkKCUUBQv7u3hlwPvTLdyTIcf1fm/view?usp=drive_link. These are view links, so I should access text content directly.

Grok: OK, let's think about why 'browse' might not show text. It could be that Google Drive files, like PDFs, aren't easily scraped for content.
